title: Bowles: Bucs' 'inexcusable' loss falls on players
content: Buccaneers coach Todd Bowles called Thursday night's 29-28 loss "inexcusable" and put the onus on his players to hold one another accountable and execute on the field.

title: Vonn, 41, earns 1st WCup downhill win since 2018
content: Lindsey Vonn raced to a stunning fast win in a World Cup downhill to earn her first victory in nearly eight years -- and the first in her comeback with titanium implants in her right knee after a five-year retirement.

title: Sources: UNC fires OC after difficult 2025 season
content: North Carolina is making its first changes in the wake of coach Bill Belichick's 4-8 debut season, firing offensive coordinator Freddie Kitchens and special teams coordinator Mike Priefer, sources told ESPN.

title: LSU's Kiffin set to return to Ole Miss on Sept. 19
content: LSU's Lane Kiffin will make his return to Ole Miss on Sept. 19, as the SEC announced the dates for its first nine-game schedule.

title: Pitts in Sharpe's company with rare 3-TD night
content: Kyle Pitts became the first tight end to reach at least 150 yards with three touchdowns in a game since Shannon Sharpe in 1996, lifting the Falcons to a dramatic 29-28 win over the Bucs.

title: Moore expected in court Fri., remains in custody
content: Fired Michigan football coach Sherrone Moore, who remains in custody as a suspect in an alleged assault, is expected to appear in court for arraignment Friday.

title: Fans slam FIFA 'betrayal' over WC ticket prices
content: Fans have accused FIFA of a "monumental betrayal" after latest prices for World Cup tickets began to circulate on Thursday.

title: Paul admits Benavidez on his boxers-to-avoid list
content: Jake Paul, who will face the toughest test of his boxing career when he fights Anthony Joshua on Dec. 19, admitted undefeated WBC light heavyweight champion David Benavidez is one fighter he'll avoid calling out.

title: üèà 2026 NFL draft: Yates' first-round projections
content: Which teams need a quarterback? Could Ohio State dominate the first round? Field Yates projects the opening 32 picks of next year's draft.

title: Inclusion of Parekh, Misa is a step in right direction for Canada at World Juniors
content: Has Hockey Canada finally learned from past mistakes -- and could that result in a gold this time around?

title: Top 50 USMNT players, ranked by club form: A new No. 1 leads the American pool
content: Who are the 50 best USMNT players as 2025 comes to a close? We have a first-time No. 1 in our ranking as the USMNT Player Performance Index returns.

title: Our guide to every Week 15 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions and what's at stake
content: Who can improve their chances of making the playoffs? And who is likely out? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 15 game.

title: Jordan's 23XI antitrust suit pushed dinosaurs out and NASCAR into the future
content: The way NASCAR had long done business had become obsolete, but the antitrust suit brought by Michael Jordan and settled on Thursday, changes that.

title: Ranking the top nine NFL head coaching candidates: Which coordinators could land an open job?
content: Will former head coaches Vance Joseph and Matt Nagy get another shot? Could Joe Brady get interviews? We stacked the hottest coaching candidates right now.

title: After epic World Series, Dodgers and Blue Jays could also rule MLB offseason
content: Baseball insiders were abuzz over L.A. and Toronto at this week's winter meetings, as both have the money -- and pull -- to dominate the winter.

title: Dates for Georgia-Bama, LSU-Ole Miss and every other SEC game in 2026
content: Find out when every SEC game will be, including Lane Kiffin's return to Oxford and Georgia's trip to Alabama.

title: Why some NBA teams might avoid a Giannis or AD trade: 'Cost of a mistake is too high'
content: One superstar trade away from NBA title contention? You better be right. If not, the consequences have never been harsher.

title: Preview: Everything to know about each semifinal in Las Vegas
content: The Emirates NBA Cup semifinals are officially set. Here is everything to know ahead of Saturday's games.

title: Power Rankings: The 4-team race for No. 1
content: Arizona, Duke, Michigan and Iowa State each have legitimate cases to top this week's edition. Which prevailed?

title: 5 early lessons: Real vs. pretend contenders, more
content: Michigan is better than expected. Kentucky is worse. And Duke headlines an ACC that looks as if it's "back."

title: Here's how Browns QB Shedeur Sanders is making progress
content: Cleveland coach Kevin Stefanski praises his rookie signal-caller for finding balance by extending plays.

title: For Nebraska's Dani Busboom Kelly, home is where you hang a banner
content: Replacing legendary coach and mentor John Cook was just a step on her path to building a legend of her own.

title: FCS quarterfinal preview: Is it now Tarleton State's tourney to win?
content: After a spate of upsets, there are familiar teams but also some newcomers at the top of the FCS bracket.

title: Expert picks, best bets: Royval's path to victory at UFC Fight Night
content: Where's the value on the final UFC fight card of the year? MMA insiders and a betting expert make their picks for Brandon Royval vs. Manel Kape.

title: Bear and pirate imagery headline Bruins' and Lightning's 2026 NHL Stadium Series looks
content: The Tampa Bay Lightning's jersey for the 2026 Stadium Series will include pirate imagery and photo-realistic lightning.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Brock Purdy, Chase Brown are league winners down the stretch
content: With the upcoming schedule, don't be surprised if Brock Purdy and Chase Brown are difference-makers down the stretch.

title: What could stop Haaland breaking Shearer's Premier League goal record?
content: For years, Alan Shearer's all-time record of 260 Premier League goals looked like it would never be broken. But that was before Erling Haaland arrived.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Salah out, Elliott back at Liverpool in January?
content: Mohamed Salah's possible Liverpool exit could be offset by Harvey Elliott's return to Anfield in January. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Maharashtra teams up with Microsoft to catch cyber criminals using AI
content: ‚ÄúThe AI tool will increase the efficiency of policing and reduce the turnaround time of investigation by 80%,‚Äù says Microsoft team

title: Opposition protests absence of Ministers in Rajya Sabha, leads to adjournment
content: Minutes after the House convened for the day, the Opposition pointed out that there was no Cabinet Minister present, which they called ‚Äòinsult to the House‚Äô

title: High security in place to ensure peaceful counting in Kozhikode
content: The support of more than 7,000 police officers will be ensured across the district to maintain law and order

title: Anganwadi workers in Andhra Pradesh stage protest seeking redress of their grievances
content: Besides a rise in wages, they are seeking implementation of gratuity and increase in menu charges for mothers and children

title: KTR hails good show by BRS-backed candidates in GP polls
content: Party leader Jagadish Reddy‚Äôs father elected Sarpanch of Nagaram village in Suryapet district at the age of 95

title: Six bodies recovered so far from site of Arunachal accident, many still missing
content: All those travelling in the vehicle were labourers from Assam's Tezpur district. The accident happened on the evening of December 8, around 40 km from Hayuliang towards Chaglagam.

title: IFFK 2025: A tale of sisterhood in the rap world
content: Spanish-Mexican film Ruido chronicles the struggles of an African teen in Barcelona, keen to make a mark in rap. Rock-solid support from women propel her to success, surmounting racist, sexist barriers

title: Watch: Rajinikanth at 75: The Hindu celebrates the legacy of a cinema icon
content: As Rajinikanth marks his 75th birthday, The Hindu presents a special compilation of rare interviews, archival moments and reflections on his remarkable journey.

title: Counting to be held at 20 centres in Kozhikode
content: There are 12 block-level centres to count the votes of grama panchayats and one centre each for seven municipalities; Government Vocational Higher Secondary School for Girls, Nadakkavu, is the counting centre for the Kozhikode Corporation

title: Govt. has strengthened framework to combat fake news across media platforms, says I&B Minister
content: A broad statutory and institutional framework already exists to address fake news across various media platforms, says Ashwini Vaishnaw

title: Probe finds major irregularities in KKHRAC Society; report submitted to CM
content: Sudhir Kumar report tracks three years of irregular spending and calls it one of Karnataka‚Äôs biggest fund misuse cases between 2020-21 and 2020‚Äì23

title: Government approves CoalSETU for auction of coal linkages without end-use restrictions
content: The policy will allow allocation of coal linkages on an auction basis on long-term for any industrial use and export by adding a separate window named CoalSETU in the NRS (Non-Regulated Sector) Linkage Auction Policy of 2016

title: Kerala HC dismisses appeals against Malayalam film Haal
content: Petitions were against a single judge‚Äôs decision that had set aside the A-certification issued by the CBFC  to Haal

title: IFFK 2025: The ebb and flow of a luminous life
content: Chopin, a Sonata in Paris by Polish filmmaker Michal Kwiecinski, chronicles the last few years in the life of legendary musician Frederic Chopin, who died at the age of 39. The film deals with Chopin‚Äôs sublime musical journey as also with his tryst with debilitating tuberculosis, with the latter sequences getting a bit repetitive

title: Chennai-Vijayawada Vande Bharat to run up to Narsapur from December 15
content: The train will depart Narsapur at 2.50 p.m. and reach Chennai Central at 11.45 p.m.; in the return direction, it will depart Chennai Central at 5.30 a.m. and reach Narsapur at 2.10 p.m.

title: Cabinet nod for Bill seeking to open up civil nuclear sector for private participation
content: The Union Cabinet approved the SHANTI Bill on Friday, as India eyes 100 GW atomic energy capacity by 2047

title: Red Fort Blast: Delhi Court Sends 3 Doctors, Preacher To 12 Days Jail
content: A Delhi court on Friday remanded three doctors and a preacher who were arrested in connection with the November 10 Red Fort blast case to 12 days of judicial custody.

title: Displaced Gazans Face Floods Amid Heavy Rains, Supply Blockage: UN
content: Hundreds of thousands of displaced Gazans face flooding of their tents and shelters by heavy rains, and materials for shelters and sandbags are not being allowed to enter the enclave, the UN International Organization for Migration said on Friday.

title: May Not Like Parts Of New US Proposals On Ukraine Peace Deal: Kremlin
content: Kremlin foreign policy aide Yuri Ushakov said on Friday that Moscow has not seen revised U.S. proposals made after the most recent talks with Ukraine, but that it may not like parts of them.

title: Zubeen Garg's Cousin, Who Went To Singapore With Him, Named In Chargesheet
content: The special investigation team (SIT) that is probing the death of Assam's cultural icon Zubeen Garg has filed a chargesheet at a local court in Guwahati.

title: Pope Francis To Charlie Kirk: Top Influential Figures Who Died In 2025
content: At least a dozen of the world's most influential figures across politics, spirituality, science, business, and sports died in 2025.

title: Kerala Local Body Polls: Results To Be Declared On Saturday
content: The results of the key 2025 local body polls in Kerala will be declared on Saturday when the ballots cast by over two crore voters will be counted at 244 centres and 14 district collectorates.

title: "Apples And Oranges": Congress MP On Rahul, Priyanka Gandhi's Speeches
content: Senior Congress leader Renuka Renuka Chowdhury said today that Rahul and Priyanka Gandhi were very different people whose styles of address are very different and should not be subject to comparison.

title: Completely Immune To Ill-Informed Commentary On Pending Cases: Top Court
content: The observations were made when the top court was hearing a case concerning the repatriation of certain individuals deported to Bangladesh on the alleged ground that due process was not followed.

title: Can't Cap Airfares For Entire Year, Aviation Minister Tells Parliament
content: Civil Aviation Minister K Rammohan Naidu told the Lok Sabha today that the government cannot impose fare caps for an entire year, citing seasonal fluctuations in demand and operational realities of the aviation sector.

title: Asaduddin Owaisi's Party Open To Tie-Up With Humayun Kabir. What His Bengal Unit Said
content: The West Bengal unit of Asaduddin Owaisi's AIMIM party is optimistic for an alliance with Humayun Kabir, the Trinamool rebel MLA who has emerged as a key minority voice in the run-up to next year's state elections.

title: UP Woman Dies By Suicide After Going Live On Facebook
content: According to police, the woman went live on Facebook around 5.30 am. Meta alerted the police control room.

title: Indian-Origin Millionaire Crashes Tesla, Tries to Burn Down US Winery
content: An Indian-origin millionaire, Vikram Beri, was arrested in the United States for allegedly trying to set fire to a winery in California. While trying to flee, he intentionally crashed into two parked cars.

title: Flagship Programme MNREGA To Get A New Name, Proposal Now With Cabinet
content: A proposal has been submitted to the Cabinet to change the name of the erstwhile UPA government's flagship MNREGA (Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme).

title: PMK Leader's Visit To Vijay-Led TVK's Headquarters Sparks Alliance Buzz
content: K Balu said the purpose was his visit was to invite the TVK to participate in their December 17 protest in Chennai, demanding a caste-based survey in the state.

title: Retail Inflation Rises To 0.71% In November, Below RBI Target Of 2-6%
content: India's annual retail inflation quickened to 0.71% year-on-year in November, picking up from a record low in October, as the pace of decline in food prices slowed, government data showed on Friday.

title: Leopard Moving Within Pune Airport Since April Tranquilised, Rescued
content: A male adult leopard that had been intermittently moving within the Pune Airport premises since late April has been darted and captured safely, forest officials said on Friday.

title: To "Your Daughter Hates You" Jibe, Elon Musk Asks, "Referring To My Son?"
content: Elon Musk has likened his transgender daughter's transition to a "tragic mental illness," reflecting his strong dislike for gender reassignments in response to a Democrat's jibe at the world's richest man.

title: IMF Tightens Noose On Pakistan's $7 Billion Bailout, Imposes New Conditions
content: Troubles seem to be chasing the cash-strapped Pakistan, with the International Monetary Fund (IMF) slapping 11 new conditions on Islamabad under its $7 billion bailout programme to crack down on corruption.

title: Bill to set up single higher education regulator gets Cabinet nod
content: The single higher education regulator which was proposed in the new National Education Policy, looks to replace the UGC, the AICTE and the National Council for Teacher Education.

title: Stray dog crisis in Kollam takes a political turn
content: Amid rising dog bite incidents and rabies-related deaths, the Opposition slams the ruling coalition for its failure in implementing effective animal control measures during campaigning for the local body elections.

title: A few foreign leaders have commented on India's internal issues in recent past: Government tells Lok Sabha
content: ‚ÄúGovernment has taken note of international media reports on various aspects of India, including on internal situation in country. It closely monitors such reports and, as required, counters any baseless claims and assertions made about India," says Minister of State for External Affairs

title: CSMRS team conducts quality assurance studies at Polavaram irrigation project site
content: Besides examining the soil, rock, and other construction material to be used in the main Earth-cum-Rock Fill (ECRF) dam, the expert team performs quality evaluations in the project‚Äôs Gap-1 and Gap-2 zones

title: ‚ÄòPublication retractions from India have skyrocketed since 2022‚Äô
content: The biggest concern right now is the use of gen AI to generate fake data, papers and reviews, Achal Agrawal, founder of India Research Watch and one of Nature‚Äôs 10, a list of people who ‚Äòshaped science in 2025‚Äô, said

title: Pawan Kalyan honours World Cup-winning blind women cricketers
content: Lauding the team‚Äôs victory as a moment of immense pride, he assures his support for the development of necessary infrastructure

title: Leopard tranquilised, rescued from tunnel on Pune airport premises
content: ‚ÄúThe feline was captured following a multi-agency operation led by the Forest Department, in collaboration with RESQ Charitable Trust, the Indian Air Force, and Pune Airport authorities,‚Äù  says forest officials

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Second anniversary of Ram temple's consecration to be celebrated on December 31, says trust
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh and Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath are likely to attend as chief guests

title: Watch: Congress leader and former Union Minister Shivraj Patil passes away
content: Senior Congress leader and former Union Home Minister Shivraj Patil passed away at 90 in his hometown Latur on December 12 after a brief illness. A seven-term MP and former Lok Sabha Speaker, Patil held key portfolios including Home, Defence, and Commerce, and later served as Governor of Punjab. Known for his dignity, scholarship, and deep grasp of constitutional matters, he remained a respected figure across parties. Tributes poured in from national leaders.

title: Cabinet approves Bill to hike FDI in insurance sector to 100%
content: The finance ministry has proposed amending various provisions of the Insurance Act, 1938, including raising FDI in the insurance sector to 100%, reducing paid-up capital, and introducing a composite licence

title: Tribal activists in Mysuru flag lapses in implementing Forest Rights Act
content: Development through Education (DEED), an NGO spearheading the cause of tribals in Hunsur, said there was a low rate of acceptance of claims submitted by the tribals with respect to forest rights, not only in Mysuru district but other regions with significant tribal population.

title: Uttar Pradesh court grants conditional bail to Maulana, one other in Bareilly violence case
content: Maulana Tauqeer Raza has been granted bail in four cases so far, but he will remain in jail, as his bail is still pending in six other cases

title: Chaos, confusion and cancellations
content: A first-person account of not one, but two flight disruptions in a single trip. And it wasn‚Äôt just Indigo

title: Ten Maoists surrender in Chhattisgarh's Sukma district
content: With this, a total of 263 Maoists have quit violence in the district this year, said Superintendent of Police Kiran Chavan

title: Karur stampede case: Sense of fairness behind order appointing non-Tamil Nadu ¬≠‚Äònative‚Äô police officers, says Supreme Court
content: The Tamil Nadu government sought a change in the constitution of the supervisory committee, accusing one of the two police officers of a previous instance of bias in favour of a rival political party

title: Nightclub tragedy: Goa BJP asks Michael Lobo, Dilip Parulekar to clarify graft remarks
content: MLA Michael Lobo and former Tourism Minister Dilip Parulekar had alleged large-scale corruption in the beach belt, claiming that it had resulted in illegalities in the tourism sector

title: India, New Zealand discuss ways to fast-track FTA talks
content: The proposed FTA is expected to further boost trade flows, promote investment linkages, strengthen supply chain resilience, and create a predictable framework for businesses in both countries

title: Odisha Congress leader Mohammed Moquim slams Rahul Gandhi‚Äôs ‚Äòinaccessibility‚Äô
content: The former Congress MLA from Barabati-Cuttak questioned the leadership style of president Mallikarjun Kharge

title: Arogya Sanjeevini: 12 private hospitals in Mandya asked to seek empanelment
content: The DC said that the district has nearly 18,000 government employees, and their physical and mental well-being is vital for efficient administration

title: Rupee slumps 9 paise to close at an all-time low of 90.41 against U.S. dollar
content: Forex traders said the rupee is under pressure, largely due to aggressive dollar purchases by importers amid surging global precious metal prices

title: Census 2027 to cost ‚Çπ11,718 crore, no budget earmarked for NPR
content: The ‚Äúlargest administrative and statistical exercise in the world‚Äù will ensure that data is provided to Ministries in a ‚Äúclean, machine-readable and actionable format‚Äù as part of the ‚ÄúCensus-as-a-Service (CaaS)‚Äù initiative, a government statement said.

title: Should we relocate everyone to moon, Supreme Court asks while dismissing plea on earthquakes
content: The petitioner said that earlier it was considered that only Delhi was in the high seismic zone, but recently it was concluded that 75% of the Indian population falls under it

title: The story behind Goa‚Äôs 18-foot crochet Christmas tree
content: Goa-based Crochet Collective has curated an 18-foot crochet Christmas tree which has been knitted by 25 women from across the state

title: IndiGo flight disruptions: Board approves appointment of Captain John Illson for independent expert review
content: A press statement said Captain John Illson brings more than four decades of aviation experience across the FAA, ICAO, IATA and major global carriers

title: Ponzi scam crackdown: ED attaches assets worth ‚Çπ17.91 crore in Meghalaya
content: The attachment under the PMLA, 2002, includes 13 immovable and seven movable properties, among them several luxury cars are allegedly acquired using proceeds of crime

title: Rajya Sabha pays tributes to former HM Shivraj Patil
content: The Rajya Sabha on Friday remembered former Union Home Minister Shivraj Patil as a seasoned statesman, recalling his tenure as Lok Sabha Speaker, Union Minister and Governor, and his enduring imprint on public life

title: Man among three arrested after wife dies during abortion at home in Dharmapuri
content: Through illegal foetus determination, the husband found that the woman was pregnant with a female foetus; he decided to terminate her pregnancy at home with the help of a nurse and a mediator

title: Major wildfire breaks out in Nagaland‚Äôs Western Dzukou Valley
content: The fire was first spotted by a tourist guide, who immediately alerted the Khonoma village authorities and the district administration

title: Tipra Motha to contest in 25-30 seats in next State Assembly elections: Debbarma
content: The TMP has a strong presence in the tribal areas of Tripura, as 20 seats are reserved for Scheduled Tribes, while tribal voters are a factor in 22 more Assembly segments

title: Process to elect new Uttar Pradesh BJP president to be completed by¬†December 14
content: Senior party leader and organisational election officer Mahendra Nath Pandey in a statement said nominations for the post of Uttar Pradesh BJP president will be filed¬†on December 13

title: Mercedes to hike vehicle prices by up to 2% to offset impact of weakening rupee
content: Rise in input costs, commodity prices, and increased logistical expenses, in combination with inflationary pressures, have been creating significant pressure on Mercedes' net profit

title: Sabarimala gold theft case: Vigilance court denies former TDB president A. Padmakumar bail
content: Court accepts the prosecution‚Äôs argument that there was sufficient evidence to prove the CPI(M) leader‚Äôs role in the suspected gold theft

title: Sudha Murty urges government to introduce amendment for free and compulsory early childhood care
content: Sudha Murthy opened her speech by congratulating Anganwadi workers who are contributing to the country, particularly in rural areas

title: Youth killed in Magadi road accident after being hit by vehicle linked to son of former Karnataka minister H.M. Revanna
content: Former Minister told reporters that their driver was at the wheel of the SUV at the time of the accident

title: Kerala local body polls: Widespread violence and bogus voting alleged across Kannur; parties trade charges
content: UDF, IUML and BJP accuse CPI(M) of orchestrating systematic disruption across the district. CPI(M) rejects charges, counter-alleging that UDF is resorting to false propaganda ‚Äòin fear of impending defeat‚Äô

title: Make in India: Usha calls on government to promote manufacturing of anti-doping kits in India
content: Usha raised the issue in Rajya Sabha and said that having to import testing kits causes delayed results and dependency on "external agencies"

title: MLA V. Joy rubbishes BJP leader Anoop Antony‚Äôs social media post on school infrastructure in Kerala
content: Referencing a photo of Joy casting his vote at a school in Thiruvananthapuram district, Antony sought to draw attention to its condition. Joy wrote on Facebook that it was foolish to form opinions in haste

title: 'Something wrong in HC': SC scraps plea on Karur stampede probe; warns TN govt
content: The Supreme Court rejected Tamil Nadu's plea to modify its order suspending the state's inquiry commission and SIT probe into the Karur stampede. Emphasizing fairness, the bench also criticized a Madras High Court report on a writ petition's registration. The court previously ordered a CBI investigation and a supervisory committee.

title: Zubeen Garg death: 4 charged with murder; singer's cousin accused of culpable homicide
content: A Special Investigation Team has charged four individuals with murder in the Zubeen Garg death case. The singer's cousin, a suspended Assam Police officer, faces charges of culpable homicide not amounting to murder. Two personal security officers are accused of criminal breach of trust. This development follows the singer's death in Singapore, where local police initially found no foul play.

title: From ages 8 to 18: How an all-girl team is taking free chess to rural India
content: A program called Checkmate Betul is bringing chess to girls in rural India. Initiated by Avika Shukla, the program teaches valuable skills like critical thinking and decision-making. The initiative has expanded to Uttar Pradesh and aims to reach more girls. It provides online lessons and physical boards, fostering confidence and new opportunities for young learners.

title: New power bloc: Trump may be ditching G7 for new 'Core-5'; which countries are on list
content: Reports suggest Donald Trump is considering a new "Core-5" bloc including China and Russia, a stark contrast to his previous stance. This idea, though unconfirmed, aligns with his transactional approach to foreign policy. The proposal emerges amidst ongoing trade tensions and follows a recent call between PM Modi and Trump.

title: Microsoft AI CEO opens up: 'Told to quit school at 16' - Suleyman on working-class life
content: Microsoft AI chief Mustafa Suleyman reveals his working-class London upbringing shaped his tech vision. The DeepMind co-founder, whose Syrian taxi driver father and nurse mother urged him to learn a trade, lived independently from age 16 before dropping out of Oxford to help Muslim youth post-9/11. Now he champions AI for social good and universal basic income.

title: 'Cricketers indulge in vices during overseas tours': Ravindra Jadeja's wife claims
content: Ravindra Jadeja's wife, Rivaba, has sparked discussion by alleging that some Indian cricketers engage in vices during overseas tours, while asserting her husband remains untouched by such activities. She highlighted that players often act freely away from public scrutiny, but Jadeja, understanding his responsibilities, avoids these temptations. Her remarks have gained traction online.

title: 'DKS will be CM ...': Cong MLA reignites rumours; confirms dy CM hosted dinner
content: Karnataka Congress MLA Iqbal Hussain claimed Deputy Chief Minister D K Shivakumar will become chief minister after the ongoing winter session, fueling speculation of a leadership change. Hussain, who attended a dinner with legislators, stated Shivakumar's elevation is due to his efforts and party contributions, with the high command to make the final decision.

title: 'World War 3!' Trump makes explosive claim; frustrated over Russia-Ukraine war
content: President Trump issued a grave warning about the Russia-Ukraine war, fearing it could escalate into a third world war. He expressed deep frustration with stalled peace talks, urging an immediate halt to fighting. European leaders are now stepping in to shape negotiations, while battlefield pressures mount. Trump insists swift action is crucial to prevent a wider global conflict.

title: Disney-OpenAI deal: Company embraces AI through ChatGPT; targets Google
content: Disney partners with OpenAI for a $1 billion investment, aiming to leverage AI for engagement with younger audiences and integrate user-generated content on Disney+. This move contrasts sharply with Disney's legal action against Google, accusing the search giant of massive copyright infringement through its AI models, a claim Google refutes.

title: Watch: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi turns eagle, grabs sharp catch after 171-run knock in U19 Asia Cup 2025
content: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi starred with a record-shattering 171 and a spectacular diving catch as India U19 began their Asia Cup campaign with an overwhelming 234-run victory over UAE. Sooryavanshi's explosive batting, supported by strong partnerships, propelled India to a massive 433/6. The UAE chase faltered early, with only skipper Uddish Suri offering significant resistance.

title: Census 2027: Govt allocates Rs 11,700 cr; headcount to begin from April
content: India's upcoming census in 2027, costing Rs 11,700 crore, will be the nation's first fully digital exercise. Conducted in two phases from April 2026 to February 2027, it will cover housing and population, including social status and caste details. This significant undertaking is also projected to create one crore employment opportunities.

title: Pete Alonso‚Äôs Orioles deal sparks emotional farewell message from wife Haeley
content: Pete Alonso's five-year, $155 million deal with the Baltimore Orioles marks a significant career shift, concluding his time with the New York Mets. His wife, Haeley Alonso, shared a heartfelt reflection on their seven years in New York, cherishing memories from his 2019 rookie season and expressing gratitude for the city and its fans.

title: AI browser battle: Google unveils Disco; highlights gaps in OpenAI‚Äôs Atlas
content: Google unveils Disco, an experimental browser that transforms browsing activity into custom web applications using its Gemini 3 AI. This  approach, powered by GenTabs, directly challenges AI browsers like OpenAI's Atlas by building apps rather than just adding chatbots.  Disco aims to redefine browser functionality with AI at its core, offering a glimpse into the future of web navigation.

title: Game Awards 2025: Leon S Kennedy returns as Tomb Raider and Star Wars revive
content: The Game Awards 2025 saw Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 dominate with Game of the Year and a surprise DLC launch. The show also featured major reveals like Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic, new Tomb Raider titles, and Capcom's confirmation of Leon S. Kennedy in Resident Evil Requiem.

title: IndiGo crisis: External expert to identify root cause of chaos; more trouble for airline
content: IndiGo has appointed an external aviation specialist to investigate recent flight disruptions caused by non-compliance with new crew duty norms. The airline's parent company established a crisis management group after large-scale operational breakdowns. The expert will conduct a root cause analysis and identify improvement opportunities.

title: Nitish Reddy takes hat-trick in SMAT; dismisses RCB captain - Watch
content: Nitish Kumar Reddy took a hat-trick for Andhra in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy against Madhya Pradesh, reducing them to 14 for 3. Despite Reddy's bowling heroics, MP recovered with a crucial partnership to secure a four-wicket victory. Reddy's hat-trick marked the first of the current tournament season.

title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce calls reveal intimate early-romance moments
content: Taylor Swift's new docuseries, "The End of an Era," offers an intimate look at her relationship with Travis Kelce before a major Eras Tour stop.  Early phone calls reveal their comfort, humor, and mutual support, showcasing playful exchanges and deep affection that defined their connection as the tour progressed.

title: India-China thaw: Centre fast-tracks business visas; Beijing hails move
content: India has expedited business visa procedures for Chinese professionals, a move aimed at boosting bilateral relations and addressing skilled technician shortages. This development follows statements from Chinese officials expressing willingness to enhance personnel exchanges and work towards resolving border tensions with India.

title: 'Tamil Nadu govt anti-Sanatan': Big BJP, DMK face-off in LS; uproar over Deepam row
content: BJP leader Anurag Thakur accused the Tamil Nadu government of an "anti-Sanatan" stance over the Karthigai Deepam dispute. The state government defied Madras High Court orders to light a ceremonial lamp at Thiruparankundram temple, leading to contempt proceedings and protests. The government has appealed to the Supreme Court.

title: Still searching for success: Delhi Capitals hunt for opener, pacer at IPL Auction
content: Delhi Capitals, despite a strong start last season, faltered and missed playoffs. Ahead of the IPL auction with Rs 21.80 crore, they aim to fill key gaps, particularly for an explosive opener and death-bowling overseas pacers, while retaining a stable core. Nitish Rana‚Äôs arrival could also prove significant for their middle order.

title: Retail inflation: CPI inflation rises to 0.71% in November; up from 0.25% in October
content: Headline inflation rose to 0.71% in November 2025. The rural sector experienced increases in both headline and food inflation for November 2025.

title: Harvard gastroenterologist recommends: 10 best dinner combos for a healthier gut and liver
content: Evening meals significantly impact gut and liver health. Dr. Sethi highlights simple food pairings like turmeric with black pepper and yogurt with berries that aid digestion and reduce inflammation. Opting for light, colourful, whole-food dinners allows the liver to function smoothly, preventing fatigue and puffiness. Ten easy dinner combinations are provided to support a healthier liver and gut.

title: Shubman Gill's T20I form a concern? Gujarat Titans head coach Ashish Nehra 'not worried'
content: Shubman Gill‚Äôs inconsistent T20I run has sparked criticism, but Gujarat Titans head coach Ashish Nehra remains unfazed, backing his captain to regain form. In a wide-ranging chat, Nehra also praises Washington Sundar‚Äôs all-round growth, dismisses trade rumours, and outlines GT‚Äôs flexible approach ahead of the mini-auction with a largely settled core.

title: 'Unable to meet Rahul for 3 yrs': Ex-Cong MLA vents over leadership 'disconnect'; BJP piles on
content: An ex-Congress MLA from Odisha has urged Sonia Gandhi to replace party president Mallikarjun Kharge with younger leaders like Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, citing the party's disconnect with youth. The BJP highlighted this internal rift, suggesting a power struggle between 'Team Rahul' and 'Team Priyanka' is now evident within the Congress.

title: Silver prices cross Rs 2 lakh mark! MCX Silver futures hit all-time high
content: Silver prices surged past Rs 2 lakh per kg on Friday, hitting an all-time high driven by strong investor interest and favorable global markets. Experts foresee further gains due to international factors, manufacturing demand, and a weaker rupee.

title: Exclusive | Hetmyer: ‚ÄòConversations with Russell and Pollard helped me become a better six-hitter‚Äô
content: Shimron Hetmyer says elite six-hitters focus on staying still, holding their shape, and keeping their eyes locked on the ball. He further explains how training begins with basics: ground strokes, singles, twos, and timing. Only after mastering balance and position do players expand into power-hitting.

title: Watch: At 70 feet, 'world's largest Messi statue' erected in Kolkata ahead of GOAT tour
content: Kolkata is buzzing with anticipation for Lionel Messi's arrival on December 13th. A massive 70-foot statue of the football star has been built. Preparations are in full swing at Salt Lake stadium for the event. Fans are eagerly awaiting Messi's return to the city after 14 years. The atmosphere is electric as the city prepares for a memorable occasion.

title: MGNREGA to be renamed again? Govt to float proposal; to allocate Rs 1.51L cr for scheme
content: The Union Cabinet is reportedly set to approve renaming the MGNREGA to Pujya Bapu Gramin Rojgar Yojna. The government plans to introduce a bill guaranteeing 125 days of work annually to the rural poor, with an allocation of Rs 1.51 lakh crore.

title: Psychedelic flight: Alaska pilot cuts fuel mid-air under influence of magic mushrooms‚Äî watch
content: An Alaska Airlines pilot, Joseph Emerson, attempted to shut down engines mid-flight after consuming "mushrooms." The audio reveals the panic as the crew subdued him and made an emergency landing in Portland. Emerson stated he wanted to "wake up" and was convinced he wouldn't see his family, attributing his actions to grief and his first experience with psilocybin.

title: Dhurandhar box office collection day 8 (Live): Ranveer Singh starrer crossing Rs 200cr
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' has exceeded expectations in its first week, amassing a remarkable ‚Çπ207.25 crore. The film, directed by Aditya Dhar and featuring a star-studded cast, opened strong and maintained impressive collections throughout the week. Its total India net collection now stands at ‚Çπ210.85 crore.

title: Trump sanctions hit! Russia records lowest oil exports since Ukraine conflict
content: Russia's oil exports have plummeted to their lowest point since the Ukraine war began, driven by buyer avoidance, tightened US sanctions, and Ukrainian attacks.  This decline, coupled with weakening prices, has slashed Moscow's oil revenue to its lowest since February 2022, straining the Russian budget.

title: CBSE Board Exams 2026: 6 Key changes students should know about
content: CBSE has announced six major changes for the 2026 board exams that students in Classes 10 and 12 must know. Updates include a new structure for Science and Social Science papers, two annual exam sessions, 75% mandatory attendance, a new 9-point grading system from 2026, provisional Class 11 admission, and a revised paper pattern focusing on competency-based questions. Students are advised to understand these rules, follow the updated guidelines, and prepare accordingly to ensure compliance and maximise exam performance.

title: Silver price today: Silver crosses Microsoft‚Äôs m-cap to become fifth-largest asset
content: Silver has surged past Microsoft to become the fifth-largest global asset, boasting a market cap of $3.593 trillion after an over 115% rise this year. This remarkable ascent is fueled by anticipated US Federal Reserve rate cuts, making non-yielding assets like silver more attractive.

title: Investing 101: Is it okay to invest if finances aren‚Äôt perfect yet? Explained
content: Financial advisors often find clients prioritizing investment choices over fundamental financial health. The article stresses the importance of addressing high-interest debt and establishing an emergency fund before focusing on mutual funds. It outlines a sequence: protect, fix leaks, then chase returns, emphasizing guaranteed returns from debt repayment.

title: 'The fire never left': Vinesh Phogat ends retirment, launches emotional comeback for Olympics
content: Vinesh Phogat, the 31-year-old Indian wrestler, has announced her return to competitive wrestling after an 18-month retirement. Driven by her enduring passion and a desire to achieve her Olympic dream, she aims for the Los Angeles 2028 Games. Phogat, who became a mother in July 2025, sees her son as her "biggest motivation" for this comeback.

title: Putin's India visit: What was New Delhi's message for US? Explained
content: Russian President Putin's recent state visit to India was not an endorsement of Moscow, but rather a demonstration of Delhi's commitment to its non-aligned foreign policy.  According to Christopher Wood, the visit signals India's assertion of independence and refusal to be dictated by other powers.  The summit reaffirmed the strong strategic partnership between the two nations.

title: Carnage in Dubai: Vaibhav Suryavanshi smashes six-hitting world record at U-19 Asia Cup
content: India's 14-year-old prodigy Vaibhav Suryavanshi smashed a blistering 171 off 95 balls against UAE in the U-19 Asia Cup opener. His innings featured a record-breaking 14 sixes, the most ever in a Youth ODI innings, and also saw him surpass multiple Asian and global records. This remarkable performance further solidifies Suryavanshi's status as a rising star in junior cricket.

title: Romeo Lane fire: Landowner alleges officials secretly altered property status
content: In a shocking twist, the former owner of Birch by Romeo Lane nightclub, devastated by a recent fire that took 25 lives, claims his property was stealthily rezoned from a salt pan to a settlement area without his consent.

title: Rare consensus in Lok Sabha: Rahul pushes for debate on air pollution; govt agrees
content: Rahul Gandhi urged an urgent debate on worsening air pollution, emphasizing it's a non-ideological issue for cooperation. Parliamentary Affairs Minister Kiren Rijiju agreed, with the Lok Sabha's Business Advisory Committee to schedule the discussion. Delhi continues to face severe smog, with AQI reaching 'very poor' and 'severe' levels in some areas.

title: Watch: Pakistan assembly speaker finds money on floor ‚Äî 12 MPs raise hands to claim it
content: A humorous incident unfolded in Pakistan's National Assembly when the Speaker found PKR 5,000 notes on the floor. His call for the owner saw a surprising 12-13 MPs claiming the 10 notes, leading to widespread laughter and social media mockery. The money was eventually retrieved by an MP, but the episode sparked criticism regarding lawmakers' conduct and moral standards.

title: Leaked email claims Travis Turner case was hidden, raising big questions
content: A Virginia mom's leaked email exposes alleged systemic failures in Wise County Public Schools following the disappearance of football coach Travis Turner, now a fugitive charged with child pornography offenses. The email claims past misconduct was ignored, fueling parental anger and demands for answers as authorities continue their extensive search for Turner.

title: ‚ÄòWe want India in final‚Äô: Bangladesh ready to stop Vaibhav Suryavanshi again at U-19 Asia Cup
content: Bangladesh's Rizan Hossan expressed confidence in his team's ability to counter young Indian batting sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi in the U-19 Asia Cup final. Despite Suryavanshi's recent stellar form, Hossan believes Bangladesh has the talent to secure their second consecutive title.  Despite Suryavanshi's record-breaking century recently, he highlighted Bangladesh's previous victory over India.

title: A puff of politics: TMC MP says smoking outside Parliament House allowed
content: A political storm brewed in Parliament after a BJP MP accused a Trinamool Congress lawmaker of using an e-cigarette inside the Lok Sabha, a move allegedly violating a national ban. The BJP lodged a formal complaint, citing the Prohibition of Electronic Cigarettes Act, 2019. TMC, however, dismissed the claims as a manufactured controversy.

title: 42 companies, 1 Delhi address: Can Luthra empire survive its own fire? New details emerge
content: Brothers Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra built a nightlife empire from a small Delhi caf√©, expanding rapidly across India and even Dubai. However, rapid growth led to operational cracks and investor complaints. Tragedy struck when a fire at their Goa outlet claimed 25 lives, leading to the brothers' detention in Thailand amidst investigations into a complex corporate structure.

content: a look at the most impactful signee in each of the nation's top recruiting classes . the top scouts have a clearer picture of what next season will look like for many of them . last year, no one has done star power like USC coach Lindsay Gottlieb .

title: As responsibilities evolve, MLB manager salaries still lag behind top coaches in other sports
content: Pat Murphy and Stephen Vogt both won manager of the year for the first time in 2024 . the two became just the second managers in each league to win the award in back-to-back seasons . this year, they became the first managers in a row to receive the award .

title: IndiGo crisis: Govt clarifies on capping air fares; what aviation minister said in LS
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." title: Bucs' Creamsicles, Falcons' throwbacks top Week 15 uniforms
content: the Steelers will wear a color rush look on "Monday Night Football" against the Miami Dolphins . the color rush outfit will be worn on the road against the olympics on "Thursday night football"

title: Classic matchup, new engine: How to bet on Army-Navy
content: this year's matchup between Army and Navy feels ready to break formation . every season gives us a familiar script, yet something about this game hints that the usual path might not hold . this year has a different engine, but it's worth looking at what drives the numbers underneath .

title: Don't turn Liverpool chaos into Slot vs. Salah: Club bosses must step in
content: the current situation at the club is being framed in the simplest terms: Mohamed Salah vs. Arne Slot . it feels downright puerile, something straight out of the schoolyard, with fans and media playing the role of parents . slot blames little Mo for his student's poor test scores and kicks him out of class .

title: Ten (maybe 11) players to watch at NCAA volleyball tournament's Sweet 16
content: the 2025 NCAA volleyball tournament is down to its final 16 teams . can Nebraska, the no. 1 overall seed, finish undefeated and claim the program's sixth national title? will Kentucky return to the final four for the first time since winning its first national championship in 2020?

title: We made score picks for every postseason CFB game
content: the 12-team college football playoff is no longer new . there are more justifiably aggrieved teams at being left out . the annual coaching carousel always impacts the postseason . new coach Pete Golding will make his debut in the biggest game in team history .

title: Men's class rankings: USC into top 10; Tennessee and Texas A&M join
content: the biggest winner of this most recent update was USC . both of their signees made enormous leaps in the player rankings . the Trojans jumped from no. 24 all the way to no. 9 despite not adding any commitments .

title: Five players who offer upside for your lineup in Week 15
content: fantasy managers should consider starting Jauan Jennings in Week 15 . the playoffs already rolling in ESPN standard leagues and plenty of formats kicking off their tournaments this week . think big-play chops here and favorable deployment based on the week 15 slate of games .

title: NBA 25 under 25 rankings: Where Wemby, Ant, Flagg and more young stars check in
content: San Antonio Spurs phenom Victor Wembanyama is leading the way on a list that examines the best young talents in the league . the top 25 players under the age of 25 based on long-term potential . here's how each exciting young star can take the next step .

title: MLB winter meetings winners, losers and head-scratching moves
content: the 2025 winter meetings didn't have a $700 million-plus deal like last year . but there were still a number of impactful free agent signings . veteran slugger Kyle Schwarber chose to return to the Philadelphia Phillies on a five-year deal in the first major splash of the meetings .

title: Connelly's alt-college football awards: Catch of the Year, 'Dog in Him' and more
content: the 2025 Heisman trophy is the culmination of college football's awards week . the trophy is a 222-yard victory over Ohio State in the Big Ten championship . it is based on the weekly heisman horse race I maintain in my Sunday recap columns .

title: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus fantasy hockey panic or patience
content: a panel of ESPN fantasy hockey commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday . it's not too late to join ESPN Fantasy Hockey , with new leagues starting every Monday .

title: The NFL's best player through 14 games is ...? Barnwell stacks MVP candidates, picks winner
content: quarterbacks Drake Maye and Matthew Stafford have a clear top two for MVP in the betting market . there's still enough time left in the season for that to shift if another candidate gets hot and leads his team to a division title or a top seed in the conference down the stretch .
